backend/main.mo: Defines core actor state and types for organizations, integrations, users, alerts, dashboards, and related comparison helpers.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic converting old actor state to new structure by adding dashboard fields and initializing IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries referencing frontend files, components, and test IDs for implemented features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains summarized descriptions of various frontend source files for reference and build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and theme definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining routes for dashboards, integrations, onboarding, analysis, reports, and custom dashboards.
frontend/src/components/alerts/AlertCard: Displays an alert with severity, details, collapsible rule info, and acknowledge/dismiss actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginGate.t: Provides a login screen using Internet Identity with a sign‑in button and branding visuals.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Renders a profile creation form that saves user name and optional email through a mutation.
frontend/src/components/charts/FunnelCha: Vertical bar chart showing funnel stages and counts using Recharts with dynamic colors.
frontend/src/components/charts/TrendChar: Line chart visualizing time‑based metrics such as placements, calls, and hours.
frontend/src/components/dashboards/Widge: Renders KPI or trend widgets by mapping widget config to metric values and chart outputs.
frontend/src/components/filters/GlobalFi: Provides global filters for date range, recruiter, and client with popovers and selects.
Main layout with navigation, sidebar, user role‑based routing, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/reports/AIReport: Renders an AI-generated report with KPI cards, an optional data table, and narrative text using shadcn UI components.
frontend/src/data/analyticsSchema.ts: Defines star-schema dimension and fact table interfaces plus sample data for recruiters, jobs, clients, and performance metrics.
frontend/src/data/sampleData.ts: Generates dashboard metrics, funnel, trend data, and alerts using filtered star‑schema fact tables.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalFilters.ts: Zustand store persisting global dashboard filter state with update and reset helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, organizations, and mappings with invalidate logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global border and body styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRoleAssign: Provides an admin UI to assign roles to principals using a form with role selection and backend mutation.
frontend/src/pages/alerts/AlertsPage.tsx: Displays active and acknowledged alerts with actions to acknowledge or dismiss, using generated sample alert data.
frontend/src/pages/analysis/FunnelAnalys: Renders funnel analytics and conversion metrics using sample data and global filters, including top-performer insights.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AllMetrics: Generates a comprehensive KPI dashboard from sample metrics and revenue data with dynamic KPI cards.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/CustomDash: Provides an interface to name, select, order, and save custom dashboard widgets via backend mutation.
Loads a user-created dashboard by ID, checks ownership, applies global filters, and renders its widgets or error/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/DashboardH: Displays categorized dashboard, analysis, report, and custom views based on user role, including an AI generator panel.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/Leadership: Shows leadership KPIs, funnel data, and trends with global filters, adapting metrics for staffing vs non-staffing orgs.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/OpsHrDashb: Presents ops/HR metrics like utilization, burnout risk, data completeness, and contractor counts plus data gap details.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PrototypeA: Provides a text-based AI query tool that parses user input into a dashboard template and navigable result.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/RecruiterD: Displays recruiter KPIs including calls, hours, pipeline movement, interviews, offers, and related tables using global filters.
frontend/src/pages/data-health/DataHealt: Renders a data health dashboard with an overall score, severity breakdowns, and issue tables driven by global filters.
frontend/src/pages/integrations/Integrat: Provides controls to connect or configure an integration, toggle sample data, and manage API key settings.
Displays a list of integrations with connection status, sync info, and actions to manage or view details.
frontend/src/pages/integrations/LoxoInte: Shows detailed configuration and status for the Loxo integration including settings and synced data stats.
frontend/src/pages/integrations/ManageIn: A sliding drawer that wraps IntegrationSettingsPanel for editing integration settings.
frontend/src/pages/leaderboards/Leaderbo: Builds leaderboards for individuals or teams with metric selection, goals, rankings, and progress indicators.
frontend/src/pages/mapping/UserMappingPa: Displays auto-matched and unmatched user mappings across multiple systems in a table.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/Onboarding: Implements a multi‑step onboarding wizard with navigation, progress tracking, and step‑specific validation based on org configuration.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/steps/Conf: Displays a final review of org type, connected integrations, and user mapping before dashboard generation.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/steps/Conn: Handles connecting Aircall via API key or sample data and updates org integration state.
Allows connecting Loxo using an API key or sample data and reflects connection status.
Manages timesheet integration setup including provider selection, API key entry, or CSV upload.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/steps/OrgT: Lets users select their organization type, updating org configuration accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/steps/User: Shows automatically generated cross‑system user mappings using sample data.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ReportsAndExp: UI page enabling dashboard exports and AI-generated reports, managing user inputs and invoking export and AI utilities.
frontend/src/state/leaderboardGoalsStore: Persisted Zustand store managing goal periods and per-recruiter/team metric targets with default initialization.
frontend/src/state/orgContext.tsx: Context and persisted Zustand store for organization configuration and integration settings with update helpers.
frontend/src/utils/aiReports.ts: Deterministic AI report generator mapping queries to metric computations, producing structured KPI, table, and narrative outputs.
frontend/src/utils/dashboardWidgetLibrar: Registry of widget definitions describing KPIs and trend charts with metadata for dashboard rendering.
frontend/src/utils/dataHealth.ts: Computes data health issues and scores using rule-based checks over filtered analytics data.
frontend/src/utils/exporters/index.ts: Simple CSV, PDF, and PPT export utilities generating basic content and triggering file downloads.
frontend/src/utils/filters.ts: Provides shared filtering utilities for calls, hours, pipeline, and placements using date ranges and recruiter/client/job criteria.
frontend/src/utils/formatting.ts: Contains numeric, currency, percent, duration, and goal‑progress formatting helpers with graceful fallback handling.
frontend/src/utils/leaderboards.ts: Computes individual and team leaderboards by applying filters and aggregating calls, hours, placements, or revenue.
frontend/src/utils/metrics.ts: Computes global metrics such as total calls, hours, efficiency ratios, and revenue using shared filters and schema data.
frontend/src/utils/prototypeAiParser.ts: Parses natural-language queries to infer dashboard type, date range, and grouping options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, plugins, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state and requirements for a prototype B2B SaaS analytics platform integrating ATS, calling, and timesheet systems. Includes architectural notes, data modeling expectations, onboarding flow requirements, and existing feature definitions.
